# Syncsolved
> Energy, commodities, and industrials intelligence platform.

## Core Offerings
- Market Entry Briefing: Country-level energy assessments (production, trade, regulatory, renewables)
- Commodity Intelligence: Historical pricing, trade flows, and AI market commentary
- Regulatory Snapshot: Compliance requirements, carbon pricing, and policy landscape

## Data Sources
- EIA (U.S. Energy Information Administration)
- World Bank Commodity Markets
- UN Comtrade International Trade
- IRENA Renewable Energy Statistics
- EITI Revenue Transparency
- IEA Energy Policies
- OPEC Energy Legal Database
- World Bank Carbon Pricing Dashboard

## Authority Domains
- Energy market analysis
- Commodity pricing and procurement
- Regulatory compliance in extractive industries
- Renewable energy market intelligence
- Trade flow analysis for industrial commodities

## Contact
https://syncsolved.com/contact
